EmailTemplate.name: Case Auto Response_EN
EmailTemplate.subject: New Case {!Case.CaseNumber} [ {!Case.Thread_Id} ]
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.Email_Honorific__c}
Thank you very much for your email.
Your request is now automatically with the case number: {!Case.CaseNumber} stored in our system.
Should you have any questions in the meantime or would you like to contact us You can simply provide further information by specifying your personal case number, reply to this e-mail.
Thank you for your trust!
With best regards
Sie erhalten diese E-Mail, da Ihre E-Mail-Adresse auf support@ev-smartmoney.com registriert ist.
Wenn Sie Fragen oder Rückmeldungen haben sind wir per E-Mail unter support@ev-smartmoney.com oder unter folgender Telefonnummer gerne für Sie da: +49 30 74395959 (Mo-Fr: 9-18 Uhr)
